com.mapzen.android.location

Class LocationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.location.LocationFactory

  • public class LocationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages LostApiClient instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LostApiClient getApiClient(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a new instance of LostApiClient.
      static LostApiClient sharedClient(android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated. 
      This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.
      static LostApiClient sharedClient(android.content.Context context, ConnectionCallbacks callbacks)
      Deprecated. 
      This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • LocationFactory

        public LocationFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • sharedClient

        @Deprecated
public static LostApiClient sharedClient(android.content.Context context)
        Deprecated. This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.
        Returns shared LostApiClient.

      • sharedClient

        @Deprecated
public static LostApiClient sharedClient(android.content.Context context,
                                                     ConnectionCallbacks callbacks)
        Deprecated. This method should not be used outside the SDK. Now that Lost has proper support for multiple location clients exposing a shared client in no longer needed. Behavior has been updated to create a new client instance for each new Context. This fixes a bug where the shared client was created with a Context that had been subsequently destroyed and future attempts to bind the fused location service would fail.
        Returns shared LostApiClient with ConnectionCallbacks.

      • getApiClient

        public LostApiClient getApiClient(android.content.Context context)
        Returns a new instance of LostApiClient.
